flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: This is the instructions on how to make your own survival bracelet with the kit that I got from survivalbraceletkits.com
guide.introduction_rendered: This is the instructions on how to make your own survival bracelet with the kit that I got from survivalbraceletkits.com

lines.text: Now that you have got all your paracord survial bracelet supplies from survivalbraceletkits.com we can get started on makeing your bracelet
lines.text_raw: Now that you have got all your paracord survial bracelet supplies from survivalbraceletkits.com we can get started on makeing your bracelet

lines.text: remember to feed the cord throught the top of the side release buckle
lines.text_raw: remember to feed the cord throught the top of the side release buckle

lines.text: Feed cord down throught the top
lines.text_raw: Feed cord down throught the top

lines.text: the color you cross over the top strands will be in the middle
lines.text_raw: the color you cross over the top strands will be in the middle

lines.text: Before you cut anything try on the bracelet to see if you like the fit there is still time to undo it and start over.
lines.text_raw: Before you cut anything try on the bracelet to see if you like the fit there is still time to undo it and start over.

lines.text: Use caution this plastic is very hot when melted
lines.text_raw: Use caution this plastic is very hot when melted

lines.text: If you would like to see the video go to survivalbraceletkits.com
lines.text_raw: If you would like to see the video go to survivalbraceletkits.com

guide.summary: Survial bracelets are a fun to make and can be used in a emergency to help you out of a jam. Each inch of bracelet has about a foot of strong 550 paracord or parachute cord. It comes in many colors to fit all types of peoples interests
guide.title: How to make a paracord 550 survival bracelet
